DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect atorvastatin 80 mg , versus placebo , give 12 month carotid intima-media thickness postmenopausal woman moderate hypercholesterolemia .
DOC.brief_title: Carotid Atorvastatin Study Hyperlipidemic Post-Menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman define Age = < 70 year document menopause Fasting LDL cholesterol 130 mg/ dl ( 3.37 mmol/l ) = < 190 mg/ dl ( 4.92 mmol/l ) 6 week diet Triglycerides = < 4 g/l ( 4.52 mmol/l ) Informed , write consent Age > 70 year Unconfirmed menopause Overall duration treatment HMGCoA Reductase inhibitor > 3 month within last year Patient treat lipidlowering drug within last 6 week precede randomization History myocardial infarction , coronary bypass surgery , angioplasty , stroke TIA CPK level > 3 time upper limit normal Body Mass Index > = 30
